General.Name: Bisi International Tbk
General.Description: PT BISI International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of hybrid seeds, horticulture seeds, rice seeds, and agriculture products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Corn, Vegetable and Fruit, Paddy, Pesticides and Fertilizers, and Others segments. It offers hybrid corn seeds; horticulture seeds such as sweet corn seed, peppers, cucumbers, bittergourd, cabbage, seedless watermelon, tomatoes, broccoli, cauliflower, loofah, and eggplants; and pesticides, herbicides, fungicides, plant growth regulators, gluten, fishisida, and others. The company was formerly known as PT Benihinti Suburintani and changed its name to PT BISI International Tbk in October 2006. PT BISI International Tbk was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Surabaya Mojokerto km 19, Sidoarjo, Indonesia, 61257
